quote: He saved this client $100,000 in his negotiation.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the tangible benefits of using video to highlight negotiation skills.
suggested_hook: Want to save your clients thousands? Here's how video can showcase your negotiation prowess.

quote: Video more than photos, more than text content, is the most shared content on social media.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the effectiveness of video in increasing social media engagement.
suggested_hook: Did you know video is the most shared content on social media? Here's why you should be using it.
